HHNeuron Class Reference

#include <hh_neuron.h>

Inheritance diagram for HHNeuron:

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Conductance based spiking neuron using the HH squid modell.

The model is based on a CbNeuron and includes the HH_K_Channel and HH_Na_Channel for action potetial generation.
